Why did you side with Kebris instead of Lord Hornet?"},{"lineNumber":56751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスに付いた？　人間が憎いのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you hate humans?\""},{"lineNumber":56752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「興味がねェ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't care.\""},{"lineNumber":56753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":56754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らのつまらねェ仲良しごっこにも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not interested in your stupid little friendship games,"},{"lineNumber":56755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホーネットのお題目にも、興味がねェんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"or Hornet's slogans.\""},{"lineNumber":56756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、なんだと、貴様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What did you say, you bastard!"},{"lineNumber":56757,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホーネット様は、先代魔王の遺志を継いで……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Hornet carries on the will of the previous Demon King...!\""},{"lineNumber":56758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ガイの野郎の遺言なんぞ、なんのアテになる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That bastard Guy's will is worthless."},{"lineNumber":56759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのペテン師に、お前ら引っかけられてんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You fools have been tricked by that con artist.\""},{"lineNumber":56760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと、貴様っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say, you...!\""},{"lineNumber":56761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちーとも変わっとらんのう、レイ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You haven't changed one bit, Rei.\""},{"lineNumber":56762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、カオス。ざっと1000年ちょいぶりか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Chaos. It's been about a thousand years, hasn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":56763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ヘっ。ガイにノスにアイゼルに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hah. Guy, Nos, Aizel..."},{"lineNumber":56764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの頃はそれなりに楽しかったぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Those times were somewhat fun."},{"lineNumber":56765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はさっぱりだがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"But now, not at all.\""},{"lineNumber":56766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おうおう、聞いた名だのう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, familiar names indeed."},{"lineNumber":56767,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぜーんぶ、儂があの世に送ってやったわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I sent them all to the afterlife."},{"lineNumber":56768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前も後を追え」","translatedEnglishLine":"You might as well follow them.\""},{"lineNumber":56769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、できるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Can you do that?\""},{"lineNumber":56770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無論ロン。さあいけ心の友」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course. Now go, my comrade of the heart.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よいか、カオスを持つ者よ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Listen well, you who possess Chaos!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ様はその者との決闘を望んでおられる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rei desires a duel with that person!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決闘だぁ？　ふざけたことを」
「こっちには都合ええな。
裏がないなら、やけど……」
「いいぞ！　その決闘、受けてやる！
サテラの使徒の強さ、とくと噛みしめるがいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Savor the strength of Satella's apostle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬう、魔人サテラ。
よかろう、その旨レイ様に、しかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very well, be sure to convey that to Lord Rei..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ナギ、撃て」
「デビルッ、ビーーム！」
「うおわああっ！？」
「死ね！」
撃ち落とされて高度が下がった所で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When his altitude dropped after being shot down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 跳躍したランスの一撃が魔物兵の胴を叩き斬った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance leapt and his strike cleaved through the monster soldier's torso.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく。勝手な事を言いやがって」
「使徒の意向を決めるのは主の役目だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is the Lord's role to decide the will of the apostle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか勝てないとか言わないだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely you won't say you can't win, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、楽勝だ。叩き潰してやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it's an easy win. I'll crush him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところで、なんで叩き落としたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, why did you knock him down?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気分だ」
正面から進んでいくと、
一万の軍勢が真っ二つに割れ、道が開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The army of ten thousand split cleanly in two, opening a path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く鼻を鳴らしただけのランスを先頭に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With Lance lightly snorting at the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行はその道を進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group advanced along that path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お……来たか」
「コイツがレイか？」
「おー……ふむ、間違いないのう。魔人レイじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... hmm, no doubt about it. The demon lord Rei."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイ。なんでホーネット様じゃなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rei. Why did you side with Kebris instead of Lord Hornet?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに付いた？　人間が憎いのか」
「興味がねェ」
「お前らのつまらねェ仲良しごっこにも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not interested in your stupid little friendship games,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットのお題目にも、興味がねェんだよ」
「ッ、なんだと、貴様！
ホーネット様は、先代魔王の遺志を継いで……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Hornet carries on the will of the previous Demon King...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガイの野郎の遺言なんぞ、なんのアテになる。
あのペテン師に、お前ら引っかけられてんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fools have been tricked by that con artist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと、貴様っ……！」
「ちーとも変わっとらんのう、レイ」
「よう、カオス。ざっと1000年ちょいぶりか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Chaos. It's been about a thousand years, hasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ヘっ。ガイにノスにアイゼルに……
あの頃はそれなりに楽しかったぜ。
今はさっぱりだがな」
「おうおう、聞いた名だのう。
ぜーんぶ、儂があの世に送ってやったわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I sent them all to the afterlife.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前も後を追え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You might as well follow them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、できるのか？」
「無論ロン。さあいけ心の友」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. Now go, my comrade of the heart."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気分だ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レイ。なんでホーネット様じゃなく、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not interested in your stupid little friendship games,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットのお題目にも、興味がねェんだよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fools have been tricked by that con artist."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと、貴様っ……！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I sent them all to the afterlife.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前も後を追え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You might as well follow them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、できるのか？」
「無論ロン。さあいけ心の友」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. Now go, my comrade of the heart."
